title: Restoring
content: I have Backed up my whole system with Windows 11 Backup (because I was having problems with Edge and Windows Explorer) and saved the backup to another HD in the PC. I am having great trouble trying to restore my Address books and Mail in Thunderbird. There are multiple Profiles in my Thunderbird so picking the correct one is just a guess. Is there any chance of getting my Address book (mainly) and my Mail back? Kelvin
creator: kbartlet

title: Unable to send emails. Have used program for many years -"Send" and some other words changed to shadow print
content:
Email sending has worked for long time. Next time could not send but can receive. UpdateI am a very basic computer user!! Thunderbird hoping to fix the problem but no success. I am a very basic computer operator!! Thank you for your assistance It will be a great relief.

Thanks again
creator: rod.seccombe

title: Impostazioni stampa "piè di pagina" ed altre informazioni
content: Salve a tutti, è possibile personalizzare l'intestazione ed il piè di pagina delle stampe delle mail di Mozilla Thunderbird? In particolare vorrei che stampasse a piè di pagina la data e l'ora di ricezione della mail e non quella della stampa. grazie
creator: nicolas.pagni
